issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Kitchensink, Base UI>Animation>transitions, I rotated the device after opening a "full view" window. The window was dismissed and there was no animation.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on iPod 3rd gen.
2) Navigate to Base UI>Animation>transitions
3) Tap "full view" button to open a new window
4) Rotate device

Result:
The window is dismissed without animation and unexpectedly

Expected result:
The window remains until dismissed via the button

Notes:
Occurs with 1.7.2 as well.
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Animation>transitions, Rotating device with "full view" window open dismisses window unexpectedly and with no animation
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on iPod 3rd Gen 4.0.2, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
